arc_summaries.kiara_natt_och_dag: From innocent fish-out-of-water to blood-bound submissive exploring dark desires
arc_summaries.henry_natt_och_dag: Authoritarian patriarch whose control over daughter masks complex, repressed desires
arc_summaries.elise: Queen bee turned vengeful seductress using sexuality as weapon against rival
arc_summaries.chloe: Loyal friend harboring secret submissive desires and attraction to Kiara
arc_summaries.alfred: From popular jock to possessive blood-bound dominant struggling with supernatural addiction
arc_summaries.desiree_natt_och_dag: Distant mother whose obsession with image masks repressed desires and political calculation
arc_summaries.jacques_natt_och_dag: Seductive uncle figure who represents forbidden knowledge and taboo desire
arc_summaries.eric: Tech-savvy observer using surveillance to satisfy obsession with Kiara and vampires
arc_summaries.didde: Physical enforcer using strength to dominate
arc_summaries.felicia: Elise's loyal enforcer finding identity through submission to alpha
